name: Homepage should display the correct header

statusDetails.message:
Error: browserType.launch: 
╔════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╗
║ Host system is missing dependencies to run browsers.                                       ║
║ This is most likely due to Docker image version not matching Playwright version:           ║
║ - Playwright  : 1.53.0                                                                     ║
║ - Docker image: 1.45.0                                                                     ║
║                                                                                            ║
║ Either:                                                                                    ║
║ - (recommended) use Docker image "mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v1.53.0-jammy"              ║
║ - (alternative 1) run the following command inside Docker to install missing dependencies: ║
║                                                                                            ║
║     npx playwright install-deps                                                            ║
║                                                                                            ║
║ - (alternative 2) use apt inside Docker:                                                   ║
║                                                                                            ║
║     apt-get install libgtk-4-1\                                                            ║
║         libavif13                                                                          ║
║                                                                                            ║
║ <3 Playwright Team                                                                         ║
╚════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╝
